name: Enlightened Zombies
description:
It's the Zombie Enlightenment.

Those who become zombies now know nothing about hatred or evil and simply want to spread this feeling of peace with all mankind.

Mankind, however, is still set in their wicked ways: they build walls and use weapons to separate themselves from the tranquil horde. 

All the zombies want are hugs and kisses to spread their love.

controls 

Courser - to point and click to direct the Enlightened Zombies

"-" to zoom out

"+" to zoom in.

the darker the settlement the more zombies you will need to get past its defenses.

game is won when all human settlements have been converted to Zombieism.

alt + f4  or ctrl + alt + del to exit game
